_header: Most mightful mirror of high magnificence
Subjects: Virgin Mary, praise of; Virgin Mary, prayers to
_description: Praise of the Virgin Mary, with refrain, ‘Aue domyna sancta maryia’ — twenty-eight lines

BLHar7578.First Lines:
Moost myghtfull myrrore of hy magnyfycensthe churches wyth Ioy doth
                    syng and say mater der most pure…
BLHar7578.Last Lines:
…on ther to love þis swet lady the flower of all us
                    menbefore þe trinite in his from god grant vs R
